item.title: RT by @SafeHarbourFest: Thank you all of the marvellous artists who created this journey. I really loved that. Several microcosms, several realities, united by the beauty of nature, music, words and talent. Thank you so much @maryHickson @SafeHarbourFest @BodyandSoulIrl @tinyark and all the artists!
item.dc:creator: @CedricYorke
item.description:
Thank you all of the marvellous artists who created this journey. I really loved that.
Several microcosms, several realities, united by the beauty of nature, music, words and talent.
Thank you so much @maryHickson @SafeHarbourFest @BodyandSoulIrl @tinyark and all the artists!

item.title:
√âriu. A new film by @BodyandSoulIrl made with @tinyark and us, Sounds from a Safe Harbour.
9 unique visual stories, each one a tale intricately imagined by artists and filmmakers.
Watch for free from 27 Oct - 31 Oct at http://bodyandsoul.ie/eriu
#√âriu #bodyandsoul2022
